statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT id, name, description FROM products WHERE id = 'c22c1cf0-88eb-4cf1-bac3-11c4b2f9bb0e';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, description FROM products WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'Apple%' OR description ILIKE '%juicy%' ORDER BY name ASC, price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, price, description FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE name NOT LIKE 'Banana%' AND price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 AND description LIKE '%high quality%' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE name = 'Shoes'
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT p.name, c.name as category FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.id = c.id
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 10 OR description IS NULL ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, product_name FROM categories c, products p, product_categories pc WHERE c.category_id = pc.category_id AND pc.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_description LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT product_id, SUM(product_price) AS total_price FROM products GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories USING (product_id) JOIN categories USING (category_id) WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, AVG(product_price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories USING (product_id) JOIN categories USING (category_id) WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%' ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, category_id FROM product_categories WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, category_id FROM product_categories JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY product_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE description ILIKE '%organic%' AND price < 50;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'F%';
SELECT p.name, i.image_url FROM products p JOIN images i ON p.id = i.product_id WHERE i.image_url LIKE '%.jpg';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, name, price, description FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_id, name FROM categories WHERE category_id < 5;
SELECT supplier_id, name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.product_id = c.category_id;
SELECT o.order_id, p.name AS product_name, o.quantity, o.total_price FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_date > '2022-01-01';
